#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cmath>
using namespace std;

bool prime(int a)
{
    int i;
    if (a == 1)
        return false;
    for (i = 2; i <= sqrt(a); i++)
    {
        if (a%i == 0)
            return false;
    }
    return true;
}
int digits_sum(int a)
{
    int dig, num, sum = 0;
    num = a;
    while(num != 0)
    {
        dig = num%10;
        sum += dig;
        num /= 10;
    }
    return sum;
}
int main()
{
    int t, l, u, num, count;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%d %d", &l, &u); //n1 < n2
        count = 0;
        for (num  = l; num <= u; num++)
        {
            if (prime(digits_sum(num)) == true)
                count++;
        }
        cout<<count<<endl;
        
    }
}
